H0.text: Limited is the best description of wind energy.

H1.text: Renewable is the best description of wind energy.

H2.text: Damaging is the best description of wind energy.

H3.text: Inexpensive is the best description of wind energy.

A4.text: Wind power is one of the lowest-cost electricity sources per unit of energy produced.

A5.text: Wind power is the use of wind energy to generate useful work.

A6.text: Solar power, wind power, hydroelectricity, geothermal energy, and biomass are widely agreed to be the main types of renewable energy.

A7.text: In some geographic localities, photovoltaic solar or onshore wind is the cheapest new-build electricity.
